message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on a valuable asset, and I believe it's a fair price considering its worth to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's worth to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm afraid I can't accept $700000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering it to you for $850000. This is a fair compromise that still benefits both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $700000. I'm willing to meet you at $750000. I think that's a fair price considering the product's worth to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go below $850000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $825000. This is the best I can do, and I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm afraid I've already made my best offer. I'm willing to buy the product for $750000. This is my final offer.
